name: lammps
description: Keyword/Syntax highlighting extension for Molecular Dynamics Software LAMMPS

lammps.Hover.Detail.description: Control the length of the displayed description in the hover popup.
enumDescriptions: Hover shows only a short description of the command
Hover shows the full description of the command

lammps.Hover.Enabled.description: Display command information in a popup when hovering the mouse over a recognised command or syntax.

lammps.Hover.Examples.description: Display command examples in the hover popup.

lammps.Hover.Restrictions.description: Display command restrictions in the hover popup.

markdownEnumDescriptions:
This option is intended to be used with collapsed Information pane, Autocomplete provides a label indicating the syntax in this case. ( 
 [See an example...](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45487966/79160252-c386fb80-7dd9-11ea-8c26-8daac5acae60.png)
Autocomplete-Info Panel shows a description of the parameters
Autocomplete-Info Panel shows a description of the parameters and a short description of the command
lammps.AutoComplete.Setting.markdownDescription: This option controls the behaviour of the autocompletion feature. This setting may influence the performance of the feature.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
